Name: sin
Description: Returns the sine value of a numeric parameter in radians.

Name: cos
Description: Returns the cosine value of a numeric parameter in radians.

Name: tan
Description: Returns the tangent value of a numeric parameter in radians.

Name: cot
Description: Returns the cotangent value of a numeric parameter in radians.

Name: ln
Description: Returns the natural logarithm value of a numeric parameter.

Arguments.Description: A numeric parameter to calculate the natural logarithm for.

Name: log
Description: Returns the logarithm with a specified base of a numeric parameter.

Arguments.Description: A numeric parameter to calculate the logarithm for.

Name: log2
Description: Returns the base-2 logarithm of a numeric parameter.

Arguments.Description: A numeric parameter to calculate the base-2 logarithm for.

Name: log10
Description: Returns the base-10 logarithm of a numeric parameter.

Arguments.Description: A numeric parameter to calculate the base-10 logarithm for.

Name: sinh
Description: Returns the hyperbolic sine of the specified angle in radians.

Name: cosh
Description: Returns the hyperbolic cosine of the specified angle in radians.

Name: tanh
Description: Returns the hyperbolic tangent of the specified angle in radians.

Name: coth
Description: Returns the hyperbolic cotangent of the specified angle in radians.

Name: asin
Description: Returns the angle whose sine is the specified number, in radians.

Arguments.Description: A number representing a sine value between -1 and 1.

Name: acos
Description: Returns the angle whose cosine is the specified number, in radians.

Arguments.Description: A number representing a cosine value between -1 and 1.

Name: atan
Description: Returns the angle whose tangent is the specified number, in radians.

Arguments.Description: A number representing a tangent value.

Name: acot
Description: Returns the angle whose cotangent is the specified number, in radians.

Arguments.Description: A number representing a cotangent value.
